scripts.ci:publish: bun run build && for dir in packages/*; do (cd "$dir" && PKG_NAME=$(jq -r .name package.json) && PKG_VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && if npm view "$PKG_NAME@$PKG_VERSION" version 2>/dev/null; then echo "$PKG_NAME@$PKG_VERSION already published, skipping"; else bun pm pack && npm publish *.tgz --access public && rm *.tgz; fi); done && changeset tag
